name: Microsoft 9DR-00001 Bluetooth Laser Mouse
Features: [Presentation Controls, Smoothly navigate through Microsoft PowerPoint and other presentations from up to 30 feet away from your computer., Media Remote, Use the remote feature for multimedia presentations and control digital entertainment from the comfort of your living room couch., On/Off Switch, Turn off your mouse to extend battery life., 2.4-GHz Bluetooth with First Connect Technology, Connect wirelessly right out of the box with 2.4-gigahertz (GHz) Bluetooth technology., High-Definition Laser Technology, Appreciate the precise, responsive, and smooth tracking of high-definition laser technology from Microsoft., Laser Pointer, Direct audience attention to essential information during presentations with the laser pointer.]
